t: MEROL Super Automatic Espresso Coffee Machine, 19 Bar Barista Pump Coffee Maker with Adjustable Grinder, Touch Screen, Silver : Amazon.co.uk: Home & Kitchen
s: No milk frothing features, but I can use a stand alone frother. The exterior is plastic yet sturdy and it looks decent. The insides seem well built. The Merol is a bit noisy when grinding beans and brewing espresso, but the noise only lasts for 1 minute. The company is a came-from-nowhere brand.
